original_text: Moab hath been at ease from his youth, and he hath settled on his lees, and hath not been emptied from vessel to vessel, neither hath he gone into captivity: therefore his taste remained in him, and his scent is not changed.
korean_text: 모압은 젊은 시절부터 평안하고 포로도 되지 아니하였으므로 마치 술이 그 찌끼 위에 있고 이 그릇에서 저 그릇으로 옮기지 않음 같아서 그 맛이 남아 있고 냄새가 변하지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: Moab hath been at ease from his youth
and he hath settled on his lees
and hath not been emptied from vessel to vessel
neither hath he gone into captivity
therefore his taste remained in him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그의 맛은 그대로 남아 있고

sentences.original_text: and his scent is not changed
